greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of collections of nonempty multisets of colored objects, where n is the number of objects plus the number of distinct colors.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
maple: A:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(A(n-j, k)*
T:= (n, k)-> add(A(n, k-i)*(-1)^i*binomial(k, i), i=0..k):
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n==0, 1, Sum[A[n-j, k]*DivisorSum[j, #*Binomial[# +k-1, k-1]&], {j, 1, n}]/n];
T[n_, k_] := Sum[A[n, k-i]*(-1)^i*Binomial[k, i], {i, 0, k}];
Table[a[n], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 24 2017, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 30 2015
